node.detail_zh: 患者為印尼籍外傭，曾於同時段與第 #3909、#4083、#4116 及 #4118 宗個案患者暫住於安盛僱傭公司於上環建安商業大廈的宿舍，其間曾到屯門幫忙搬屋並於該處暫住數天。患者無外遊記錄，7 月 31 日出現症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient is an Indonesian domestic helper, having resided at the boarding house of Apik Empolyment Agency at Kin On Commercial Building, Sheung Wan with patients #3909, #4083, #4116, and #4118. She temporarily stayed in Tuen Mun as she was helping out with moving house. She has no travel history and developed symptoms on July 31.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 上環建安商業大廈外傭宿舍
groups.name_en: Kin On Commercial Building (Sheung Wan) Boarding House for Domestic Helpers
groups.description_zh: 同住在上環建安商業大廈宿舍的 5 名印尼外傭確診。
groups.description_en: Five Indonesian domestic helpers residing at the boarding house of Kin On Commercial Building, Sheung Wan were diagnosed positive for the virus.
